activeProcessNames.string: Release Build Passed on all OS

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: major minor version TODO: get this from a file

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_BUILD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Flag whether or not this build is a release build candidate. If a build is a release candidate then STC_CR license/entitlement will be disabled

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAGELLAN_FRONTEND_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to magellan frontend artifact in Artifactory (https://artifactory.srv.orionprod.net)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAGELLAN_BACKEND_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to magellan backend artifact (orion-res) in Artifactory (https://artifactory.srv.orionprod.net)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ "$P4CLEANWORKSPACE" = "true" ]; then ccache -C fi
if [ "$RELEASE_BUILD" = "true" ]; then cp -f $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/include/licensing/ga_release/ControlledReleaseCheck.h $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/include/licensing/ControlledReleaseCheck.h fi

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/gcc_4_9/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH export PATH=/usr/gcc_4_9/bin:$PATH python genSln.py ./scons.sh -f SConstruct.bll -j 12 --debug=time debug=0 coverage=0 target=bll-el3 2>&1 | tee compile_output.txt python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/buildUtil/gcc_warning_detect.py compile_output.txt python $WORKSPACE/common/idl/crc.py -f bll_idl_crc.txt --desc "$JOB_NAME $BUILD_NUMBER"
# scons -j 12 --debug=time debug=0 coverage=0 target=bll-el3 2>&1 | tee compile_output.txt # python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/buildUtil/gcc_warning_detect.py compile_output.txt

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os import zipfile import urllib2 import tarfile import shutil
def _download_file_from_url(url=None): file_name = url.split('/')[-1] u = urllib2.urlopen(url) f = open(file_name, 'wb') meta = u.info() file_size = int(meta.getheaders("Content-Length")[0]) print "Downloading: %s Bytes: %s" % (file_name, file_size)
file_size_dl = 0 block_sz = 8192 while True: buffer = u.read(block_sz) if not buffer: break
file_size_dl += len(buffer) f.write(buffer) status = r"%10d [%3.2f%%]" % (file_size_dl, file_size_dl * 100. / file_size) status = status + chr(8)*(len(status)+1) print status,
f.close()
def unzip(fname,dir_name): if (fname.endswith("zip")): zip_ref = zipfile.ZipFile(fname, 'r') zip_ref.extractall(dir_name) zip_ref.close() print "Extracted in %s Directory" % dir_name else: print "Not a zip file: '%s '" % fname
def extract_tarball(fname): if (fname.endswith("tgz")): tar = tarfile.open(fname, "r:gz") tar.extractall() tar.close() elif (fname.endswith("tar")): tar = tarfile.open(fname, "r:") tar.extractall() tar.close()
# -- download and extract orion-res*.zip file if # -- specified in the job parameter #try: # orion_res_url = os.environ['ORION_RES_URL'] #except Exception, e: # print "Cannot find ORION_RES_URL in environment variable, skipping orion-res zip file download" # exit(0)
#if len(orion_res_url) > 0: # print "Downloading from %s" % orion_res_url # zip_filename = os.path.basename(orion_res_url) # if os.path.exists(zip_filename): # os.remove(zip_filename) # clean up previous file if exists # orion_res_output_dir = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], "build", "il", "bld_bll-el3_x86", "Release", "bin", 'orion-res') # if os.path.exists(orion_res_output_dir): # shutil.rmtree(orion_res_output_dir) # clean up previous output dir if exists # _download_file_from_url(orion_res_url) # unzip(zip_filename, orion_res_output_dir)# # os.chmod(os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], "build", "il", "bld_bll-el3_x86", "Release", "bin", 'orion-res', 'bin', 'orion-res'), 0755)
# -- download and extract magellan-frontend*.tgz file if # -- specified in the job parameter #try: # magellan_frontend_url = os.environ['MAGELLAN_FRONTEND_URL'] #except Exception, e: # print "Cannot find MAGELLAN_FRONTEND_URL in environment variable, skipping MAGELLAN_FRONTEND_URL tar file download" # exit(0)
#if len(magellan_frontend_url) > 0: # print "Downloading from %s" % magellan_frontend_url # os.chdir('bin') # tgz_filename = os.path.basename(magellan_frontend_url) # if os.path.exists(tgz_filename): # os.remove(tgz_filename) # clean up previous file if exists # if os.path.exists('build'): # shutil.rmtree('build') # clean up previous output dir from tgz file if exists # _download_file_from_url(magellan_frontend_url) # extract_tarball(tgz_filename) # shutil.move('build', os.path.join(orion_res_output_dir, 'content'))
# --Extract orion-res*.zip zip_filename = 'orion-res.linux-386.zip' orion_res_output_dir = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], "build", "il", "bld_bll-el3_x86", "Release", "bin", 'orion-res') if os.path.exists(orion_res_output_dir): shutil.rmtree(orion_res_output_dir) # clean up previous output dir if exists unzip(zip_filename, orion_res_output_dir) os.chmod(os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], "build", "il", "bld_bll-el3_x86", "Release", "bin", 'orion-res', 'bin', 'orion-res'), 0755)
# -- Extract magellan-frontend*.tgz os.chdir('bin') tgz_filename = 'magellan-frontend.tgz' if os.path.exists('build'): shutil.rmtree('build') # clean up previous output dir from tgz file if exists extract_tarball(tgz_filename) shutil.move('build', os.path.join(orion_res_output_dir, 'content'))

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR rm -f TestCenter*.tar.gz if [ "$BUILD_PACKAGE_BUILD" = "true" ]; then python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/buildUtil/package.py --arch-dir=Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server --package=TestCenter python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/buildUtil/package.py --arch-dir=Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server --package=STAKCommands.beta #cp TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz TestCenter.Linux.no_version.tar.gz #python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/buildUtil/setver.py --package=TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz $STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION $P4_CHANGELIST fi

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os
bld_dir = os.environ['BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR'] version = os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] wrk_space = os.environ['WORKSPACE'] in_file_name = 'pw_packages_to_test.txt' out_file_name = 'pw_packages_to_test' out_dir = "/results/SCMSmartTest"
file_to_read = os.path.join(wrk_space, bld_dir, in_file_name) file_to_update = os.path.join(out_dir, version, out_file_name)
reader = open(file_to_read, 'rb') writer = open(file_to_update, 'wb') for row in reader: writer.write(row) print "New Tags: %s" % row

import shutil import os
output_filename = 'orion-res' dir_name = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], 'build', 'il', 'bld_bll-el3_x86', 'Release', 'bin', 'orion-res') if os.path.exists('orion-res.zip'): os.remove('orion-res.zip') shutil.make_archive(output_filename, 'zip', dir_name)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [[ $P4CLEANWORKSPACE = "true" ]]; then rm -rf $WORKSPACE/* p4 -u scmbuild -p perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 -c jenkins-${NODE_NAME}-${JOB_NAME}-${BRANCH_NAME} sync //jenkins-${NODE_NAME}-${JOB_NAME}-${BRANCH_NAME}/...#none fi
